content: **the pattern is available in english and hungarian ** whiskey glass shawl is a simple triangular shawl worked top down using basic stitches to make the textured output it s like an old crystal glass set on the table of your cigar salon playing with the stitches and repeats sometimes you get on quick but in some row you have to slow down a bit and be all there size approximately 167 cm / 65 inch wingspan and 74 cm / 29 inch deep needles and materials one min 100 cm / 40 inch circular needle suggested needle size for fingering yarn 3 mm / us 3 stitch markers blocking pins blocking mats yarn 1000 m / 1094 yard fingering weight yarn i ve used scheepjes whirl / mid morning mocha roo i think the yarn choice for this pattern doesn t really matters the thicker the yarn is the more textured the shawl will be but note that in this case the sizes will change gauge 22 sts x 35 row = 10 x 10 cm
